PHRASE.LANG:
Category: Fairy form
Type: Wood

He is the brain of the Zombie Rangers. He is pessimistic and would rather stay inside, but it is getting popular because it likes to care for children and old people. [#Legal]

Catégorie: forme de fée 
Type: Bois 

 Il est le cerveau des Rangers Zombie. Il est pessimiste et préfère rester à l'intérieur, mais il devient populaire car il aime prendre soin des enfants et des personnes âgées. [#Legal]

カテゴリー：魔生物種
属性：木

腐乱戦隊ゾンビレンジャーの頭脳担当。ネガティブ思考でインドア派なのだが、子供の相手をしたり、老人に優しいなど世間的な人気は上昇傾向にある。[#Legal]

He is the brain of the Zombie Rangers. He is pessimistic and would rather stay inside, but it is getting popular because it likes to care for children and old people. [#Legal]
